summary.span: 允許 WPF 應用程式停用所有使用者介面項目的 DPI 感知。

span.span: Allows WPF applications to disable dots per inch (dpi) awareness for all user interface elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式都是 dpi 感知，使用者介面版面配置的計算方式會影響。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications are dpi aware, which affects how user interface layout is calculated. 不過，應用程式時，可以藉由新增停 dpi 感知應用程式組件。However, an application can disable dpi awareness by adding the to the application assembly. > [!CAUTION] > 很**不**建議您將這個屬性設定為您的應用程式，除非您需要所有使用者介面項目，您的應用程式變成非 dpi 感知。It is **not** recommended that you set this attribute for your application, unless you need all user interface elements of your application to be non-dpi aware. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何停用的 Dpi 感知[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]應用程式的宣告組件層級。The following example shows how to disable Dpi awareness for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application by declaring at the assembly level.
